issue.title: [Python] FileSystem.from_uri test fails on python 3.5
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7936](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7936). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See build failure at https://dev.azure.com/ursa-labs/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=7535&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=6c939d89-0d1a-51f2-8b30-091a7a82e98c&l=288

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7936?focusedCommentId=17044555) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Weren't we considering to drop Python 3.5?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7936?focusedCommentId=17045271) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
`[~apitrou]` We should discuss it on the ML

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7936?focusedCommentId=17049173) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
